channel.title: Disclaimer!
channel.description:
Should i add a disclaimer to avoid legal issues? Because the use of Jagex's graphics isnt exactally legal.
If i do add a disclaimer what do i put in it too?

item.title: Disclaimer!
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

Lol, i wont laugh :(.

I dont know if this counts as a jagex screw up but in their terms + conditions is says this:

“Intellectual property rights
Jagex® and RuneScape® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.”

I am appart of other countries which are not listed so therefore i am excluded lol?

Read full topic

item.title: Disclaimer!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

You don’t have to put a disclaimer anywhere. Thousands of people use ‘Jagex graphics’ every day when they play Runescape. If you’re really so worried about the legal issues involved, read up on the law, so you can realize there’s no way you will ever get into trouble for using moparscape.

Read full topic
